meanings.definition: Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted the portrait meticulously, making sure every brushstroke was perfect.
meanings.sent2: She always organizes her desk meticulously, with everything in its proper place.
meanings.sent3: The detective examined the crime scene meticulously, even checking under the smallest objects for clues.
meanings.sent4: The gardener tended to the flowers meticulously, as if each petal held a secret.
meanings.sent5: The architect designed the building meticulously, ensuring every angle was flawless.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows great attention to detail; very carefully and precisely.
meanings.sent1: She followed the recipe meticulously to ensure the cake turned out perfectly.
meanings.sent2: He worked meticulously on the project, double-checking every calculation.
meanings.sent3: The cat groomed itself meticulously, as if preparing for a royal visit.
meanings.sent4: The student studied meticulously, absorbing every word of the textbook.
meanings.sent5: The watchmaker repaired the timepiece meticulously, restoring it to its former glory.
